UserMeetTranslationManager::say ( $  token,
$  vars = array() 
)

Translate an externalized string token into a Unicode string in the current language.

The $vars argument provides a list of substitutions similar to sprintf().

Parameters:
string $token The externalized string token to replace
array $vars A list of substitutions
Returns:
string A string with the Unicode values encoded in UTF-8
